The '''Alberich Clan''' is a [[Khaenri'ah]]n clan and the one which [[Kaeya]] hails from.

==History==
The Alberich Clan was not of royal descent, but when King [[Irmin]] grew weak, the Alberich Clan stepped up as regents.<ref name="hidden strife brick">Event [[Hidden Strife]] Interactable: [[Hidden_Strife/Story#The_Brick|The Brick]]</ref>

The Alberich Clan does not keep written records of their affairs.<ref name="hidden strife brick" />

==Known Members==
* Kaeya's father
* [[Kaeya]] (present)
